#this is for processing data

```{r load packages, message = FALSE}

#install.packages("tidyverse")
#install.packages("here")
#install.packages("neonUtilities")
#install.packages("dplyr")


library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(neonUtilities)
library(dplyr)

```

```{r, import raw data files, warning=FALSE}

temperature_data <- read_csv(here("data","raw","mean_temp_data.csv"))

temp_data_processed <- temperature_data %>% select(siteID, startDateTime, endDateTime, tempRHMean)

temp_data_processed %>% 
  write_csv(here("data","processed","mean_temp_data_processed.csv"))

```
